p: In view of the existence in France of health insurance coverage for the poor and the undocumented (Complémentaire Santé Solidaire -CSS- and Aide Médicale d’Etat – AME-), the status relating to health insurance is a good proxy for measuring precariousness. However, it could be useful to discuss the lack of more precise data on the social situation. In particular, how were people without health insurance coverage treated?
